directions: Toss peas, bacon, raisins, Cheddar cheese, onion, and sunflower seeds together in a large bowl. Stir mayonnaise, vinegar, and sugar together in a small bowl; drizzle over the salad and toss to coat.
Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate for 1 hour.
ingredients: 1/4 teaspoon white sugar, or to taste
title: Yummy Summer Pea Salad
